title: Separation of Substances
description: Learn about different methods of separating mixtures and their applications in daily life.

questions.question: Which method is used to separate a mixture of sand and water?
questions.explanation: Filtration is used to separate insoluble solids (like sand) from liquids (like water) using a filter paper.

questions.question: What method is used to separate salt from saltwater?
questions.explanation: Evaporation is used to separate salt from saltwater by heating the solution until the water evaporates, leaving behind the salt.

questions.question: Which method is used to separate iron filings from sand?
questions.explanation: Magnetic separation is used to separate magnetic materials (like iron) from non-magnetic materials (like sand) using a magnet.

questions.question: What method is used to separate oil from water?
questions.explanation: Decantation is used to separate immiscible liquids (like oil and water) by carefully pouring off the top layer.

questions.question: Which method is used to separate different colors in ink?
questions.explanation: Chromatography is used to separate different components of a mixture (like ink) based on their different rates of movement through a medium.

questions.question: What method is used to separate cream from milk?
questions.explanation: Centrifugation is used to separate cream from milk by spinning the mixture at high speed, causing the cream to separate due to different densities.

questions.question: Which method is used to separate a mixture of salt and pepper?
questions.explanation: Sieving is used to separate solid particles of different sizes, like salt and pepper, using a sieve with appropriate-sized holes.

questions.question: What method is used to separate alcohol from water?
questions.explanation: Distillation is used to separate miscible liquids with different boiling points, like alcohol and water.

questions.question: Which method is used to separate tea leaves from tea?
questions.explanation: Filtration is used to separate tea leaves from tea using a strainer or filter paper.

questions.question: What method is used to separate a mixture of sand and iron filings?
questions.explanation: Magnetic separation is used to separate iron filings from sand by using a magnet to attract the iron particles.
